00035   {
00036     delete m_text;

00040 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041 void UISlider::addText(std::string _font, int _fontSize)
00042 {
00043   if (m_hasText == false)
00044   {
00045     m_text = new Text(_font, _fontSize);
00046     m_hasText = true;
00047   }
00048   else
00049   {
00050     std::cout<<"Error: This slider already has text."<<std::endl;
00051   }
00052 }

00054 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00055 void UISlider::updateSlider(ngl::Vec2 _pos, ngl::Vec2 _dimensions, ngl::Vec4 _colour,
00056                             ngl::Vec2 _barPos, ngl::Vec2 _barDimensions, ngl::Vec4 _barColour,
00057                             int _outputMin, int _outputMax)
00058 {
00059   m_sliderPos = _pos;
00060   m_sliderDimensions = _dimensions;
00061   m_sliderColour = _colour;
00062   m_sliderBarPos = _barPos;
00063   m_sliderBarDimensions = _barDimensions;
00064   m_sliderBarColour = _barColour;
00065   m_outputMin = _outputMin;
00066   m_outputMax = _outputMax;
00067   calculateOutput();
00068 }

00070 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00071 void UISlider::updateText(std::string _text, ngl::Vec3 _colour, ngl::Vec2 _offset)
00072 {
00073   if (m_hasText == true)
00074   {
00075     m_textString = _text;
00076     m_text->setColour(_colour.m_x, _colour.m_y, _colour.m_z);
00077     m_textOffset = _offset;
00078 
00079     m_textPos.m_x = ((m_sliderPos.m_x + 1) * m_windowDimensions.m_x) / 2;
00080     m_textPos.m_y = ((1 - m_sliderPos.m_y) * m_windowDimensions.m_y) / 2;
00081   }
00082   else
00083   {
00084     std::cout<<"Error: Text has not been initialised for this slider."<<std::endl;
00085   }
00086 }
00087 
00088 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00089 bool UISlider::isClicked(int _x, int _y)
00090 {
00091   ngl::Vec2 ndc;
00092   ndc.m_x = ((2.f * _x) / m_windowDimensions.m_x) - 1.f;
00093   ndc.m_y = 1.f - ((2.f * _y) / m_windowDimensions.m_y);
00094   if (ndc.m_x >= (m_sliderPos.m_x - m_sliderDimensions.m_x/2) && ndc.m_x <= (m_sliderPos.m_x + m_sliderDimensions.m_x/2) &&
00095       ndc.m_y >= (m_sliderPos.m_y - m_sliderDimensions.m_y/2) && ndc.m_y <= (m_sliderPos.m_y + m_sliderDimensions.m_y/2))
00096   {
00097     return true;
00098   }
00099   else
00100   {
00101     return false;
00102   }
00103 }
00104 
00105 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00106 int UISlider::slideBar(int _x)
00107 {
00108   double ndc_x = ((2.f * _x) / m_windowDimensions.m_x) - 1.f;
00109   if (ndc_x > (m_sliderPos.m_x - m_sliderDimensions.m_x/2) && ndc_x < (m_sliderPos.m_x + m_sliderDimensions.m_x/2))
00110   {
00111     m_sliderBarPos.m_x = ndc_x;
00112   }
00113   return calculateOutput();
00114 }
00115 
00116 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00117 int UISlider::calculateOutput()
00118 {
00119   double sliderParam = (m_sliderBarPos.m_x - (m_sliderPos.m_x - m_sliderDimensions.m_x/2)) / ((m_sliderPos.m_x + m_sliderDimensions.m_x/2) - (m_sliderPos.m_x - m_sliderDimensions.m_x/2));
00120   double outputDivisions = 1.0 / ((m_outputMax - m_outputMin) + 1);
00121   int outputSection = (sliderParam / outputDivisions);
00122   m_output = m_outputMin + outputSection;
00123   return m_output;
00124 }

00191 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00192 void UISlider::draw()
00193 {
00194   loadMatricesToShader(m_sliderBarPos, m_sliderBarColour);
00195   ngl::VAOPrimitives::instance()->createTrianglePlane("sliderBar", m_sliderBarDimensions.m_x, m_sliderBarDimensions.m_y, 1, 1, ngl::Vec3(0, 1, 0));
00196   ngl::VAOPrimitives::instance()->draw("sliderBar");
00197   loadMatricesToShader(m_sliderPos, m_sliderColour);
00198   ngl::VAOPrimitives::instance()->createTrianglePlane("slider", m_sliderDimensions.m_x, m_sliderDimensions.m_y, 1, 1, ngl::Vec3(0, 1, 0));
00199   ngl::VAOPrimitives::instance()->draw("slider");
00200 
00201   if (m_hasText == true)
00202   {
00203     m_text->renderText(m_textPos.m_x + m_textOffset.m_x, m_textPos.m_y + m_textOffset.m_y, m_textString);
00204   }
00205 }
00206 
00207 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00208 void UISlider::loadMatricesToShader(ngl::Vec2 _pos, ngl::Vec4 _colour)
00209 {
00210   ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00211   (*shader)["nglColourShader"]->use();
00212   shader->setShaderParam4f("Colour", _colour.m_x, _colour.m_y,_colour.m_z, 1.f);
00213 
00214   ngl::Transformation t;
00215   t.setPosition(ngl::Vec3(_pos.m_x, _pos.m_y, 0.f));
00216   t.setRotation(90.f, 0.f, 0.f);
00217 
00218   ngl::Mat4 M;
00219   ngl::Mat4 MV;
00220   ngl::Mat4 MVP;
00221   M=t.getMatrix();
00222   MV=  M*ngl::lookAt(ngl::Vec3(0, 0, 10), ngl::Vec3(0, 0, 0), ngl::Vec3(0, 1, 0));
00223   MVP= MV*ngl::ortho(-1, 1, -1, 1, 0.1f, 100.f);
00224   shader->setShaderParamFromMat4("MVP",MVP);
00225 }
